item.title: 100 errors
item.dc:creator: @moparscape4lifez moparscape4lifez
item.description:
@moparscape4lifez wrote:

happened to me today as well when I was putting in some tutorials to improve my server… I’ve noticed that some tutorials if you follow them with copy and paste method you will screw up… I fixed the problem anyawys by luck, PHEW!!

The way I fixed it was by adding }'s after the code I pasted in Idk how much… but after 2 or 3 of em it removed all the errors.
